thread.title: Disturbed Hoping To Hit The Studio Within 12 Months [News]
thread.title_full: Disturbed Hoping To Hit The Studio Within 12 Months [News]

title: Disturbed Hoping To Hit The Studio Within 12 Months [News]
text:
Disturbed Hoping to Hit the Studio Within 12 Months Another lengthy hiatus is not an option, Dan Donegan says. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 12 hours ago 2 
Disturbed guitarist Dan Donegan said the band will not be taking another lengthy break between albums, sharing plans to hit the studio within about 12 months. 
The musician said during a recent interview in Germany: "I definitely don't anticipate us taking a long break. But there might be a little bit of time - it won't be nothing like a four-year hiatus. 
"I think hopefully by at least, if not this year, by early next year, hopefully, we'll be in the studio again." 
The latest Disturbed album, " Immortalized ," saw its release in August 2015 as the band's sixth full-length studio effort. It marked the return of David Draiman and co. to the top, mostly thanks to the success of their " Sounds of Silence " cover.
